comments.author: harizen
comments.body: I take a quick look at the site and want to consider testing the waters there with the use of free coupon.The reason is just simply, my favorite game providers at our local online casinos are present there, KA Gaming and CQ9 Gaming, but unfortunately, the lucky games that I specifically want at both game providers are not present there, King of Dragons (KA) and 5 God Beast (CQ9).Anyways, on the withdrawal page, the option is only limited to USD and EURO but the required field is asking for a "Wallet Address" (I assume crypto wallet, right?). Basically, the withdrawal amount that is seen in either USD or EURO value will be converted automatically to crypto once withdrawn. Is this right? The withdrawal field should be fixed as there are lots of cryptos. The supported currencies for crypto withdrawals should be clearly seen there. P.S. Is the site functioning as live now or it's still on a test run? There are lots of errors in most games. I'm smell something unusual hmmm.
